snippet: The country lowered its 2014 growth forecast after announcing a 2.1 percent contraction in the first quarter.
lead_paragraph: The country lowered its 2014 growth forecast after announcing a 2.1 percent contraction in the first quarter.

headline.main: Thailand Economy Shrinks, Prompting Worries of Recession
headline.print_headline: Thailand Economy Shrinks, Prompting Worries of Recession
